data.title: In the heart of things
data.text: Location was great, room clean but not real user friendly, bad timing as construction impacted parking and the restaurant next door used some too, Foxy restaurant very nice, price high for breakfast but reasonable for dinner, nice to walk to. Housekeeping was good, desk accommodating but not real friendly. Yes would stay again, you can find cheaper but you will give up safety and cleanliness.

data.title: OK hotel, great location
data.text: walking distance to shops and restaurants.  The staff was kind and attentive.  Breakfast was very light, but did the job.  We experienced quite a bit of noise from construction and noisy neighbors.  Kids loved the pool- it was warm even in November.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!
We truly appreciate it, and value your presence at the Vagabond Inn Glendale. 
Please come back and visit soon!

Nadine Saikali 
General Manager

data.title: Swallowed up by congestion
data.text: Once a great little location it has now been dwarfed by 2 huge hotels on each side. The constant construction noise makes it impossible to sleep. There is rarely parking as they allow surrounding workers to park there.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on tripadvisor.com. 
We apologize for any inconvenience that you have encountered due to construction noise in the surrounding area. We are doing our best to ensure the best guest experience throughout this process. We are looking forward for your return!

Nadine Saikali 
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel close to everything in town
data.text: The hotel is clean and the staff is nice and always ready to help. The location is excelent both for business trips as well as for leisure and close to all the shops and restaurants in Glendale. The parking is extremely usefull and free.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review

Looking forward for your next visit!

owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrific location for shopping and restaurants
data.text:
Great location for shops and restaurants, two minute walk to the new, outdoor Americana at Brand and Galleria Mall across the road and loads of other shops and restaurants within easy walk. Good value for money, efficient check in, clean and comfortable room.  Good free wifi.  

The only thing we didn't like is the windows don't open at all so no fresh air unless you leave the door open.  Construction going on next door but we didn't find it too noisy, we weren't there much during the day and they are gone at night.  

My tip, don't contact central reservations if you have an issue, contact the hotel directly. Reservations were unhelpful and wanted to charge me another $50 per night when I rang to increase the number of nights on our booking but the hotel reception fixed everything quickly and efficiently. Wish I'd rung them in the first place!

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

We are looking forward for your future stay!

Nadine Saikali

owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Vagabond charged me twice
data.text: The stay was ok, but I am still trying to get refunded for the double charge on my debit card. I was charged twice for the same stay. Be careful and check your bank statement. My receipt was correct, but the charge occurred twice on my bank card.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review

data.title: Construction noise!!
data.text:
Room is fine..
Construction noise from across the parking lot from 7am-5pm. Walls are thin so everything is heard.
No sitting breakfast and it's only pastries and cereal.
Price might be right but I would spend a few extra bucks and get something better.
How this hotel is rated 2nd in Glendale is a mystery to me.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!
We apologize for any inconvenience related to construction. We are certainly taking all necessary measures to ensure the best guest experience. Thank you for your suggestions regarding to breakfast as well. We take your suggestions very seriously, and will use them to ensure an increase level of customer satisfaction moving forward. 
Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you again soon!

Nadine Saikali
General Manager

data.title: best deal for the money in SoCal
data.text: The rate for a Glendale Motel is incredible.  Not many amenities, but directly across the street from the Americana, and 2 blokes from Porto's.  The Galleria is just 3 blocks away.  Clean bed.  Housekeeping daily.

data.title: Comfortable, convenient, good value, helpful staff .... will stay here again
data.text: We booked the room to check colleges nearby & in downtown LA.  Hotel location is convenient, just across Glendale Galleria with lots of dining options. Room is clean & comfortable. Staff is helpful & friendly.  A good value with free parking, breakfast & wi-fi.

data.title: Ver nice place
data.text: We had a 2 night stay here.  Overall we were pleased with the accommodations.  We had 2 minor issues and when we reported them to the front desk, we were given a 10% discount, which we felt was very fair.  The location is a bit tricky to find since it is wedged in between other buildings, but is right off the street for easy access.  There is a shopping/restaurant mall within walking distance.  We felt safe and enjoyed our stay.

data.title: ExCeLLenT value; A+++++ hotel
data.text: Great price in an EXCELLENT location! Clean hotel, friendly staff, free treats for breakfast + all day ice water, juice,coffee, tea & hot chocolate. Decent pool for tanning and a nice dip for those warmer days & nice cable selection. There is also a fridge & microwave so you can heat up food and keep drinks cold -- It truly is a home away from home, whenever i travel to L.A, i always stay here ♡ A+++ experience.

data.text: Bed was very comfortable.  Room temperature was just the way I like it for sleeping. Great coffee in the morning. Staff handled every thing I asked of them. Easy to find. Good location. No parking problems.

data.text: The staff members were all friendly and helpful. The few instances that I required assistance were met with efficient and immediate satisfaction. Also the room was clean and the beds very comfortable.

data.title: Great value
data.text: Immaculate rooms. Mine had a mini fridge and microwave as well as big flat screen tv. The people at the front desk were all polite and helpful, the pool was clean, the landscaping was well-tended--really, there's nothing to find fault with. This is a very well-run property.

data.title: Room review
data.text: Nice clean room, no smell, big room , bathroom is clean, good customer service , it is close to every shopping mall, the parking is very small I wish they have more parking spot , other than that everything was good

data.title: one night stay
data.text: it was a one night stay and the room was nice and clean, bed was very comfortable, would stay again and would def recommend to family and friends. there was construction going on next door and woke us up a little earlier than we wanted to wake up but love that the check out was at noon.

data.title: Three nights at The Vagabond Inn - Glendale
data.text: I stayed here for three nights last spring and then again 9/1 - 9/4.  Love the location and the staff is very helpful and friendly.  The rooms are clean though show quite a bit of wear with wall paper coming up. The price is very reasonable for a hotel so close to tourist attractions and across the street from the Americana.  The biggest complaint I have is the lack of fresh air in the rooms.  I would love to be able to  open a window with a screen just a little.

owner_response.author: VIGlendale, General Manager at Vagabond Inn - Glendale, responded to this review

data.title: Clean, No Frills Place to Sleep
data.text: We were completely pleased with our stay at the Vagabond in Glendale.  It is a basic, no frills hotel with few amenities. It is an older hotel and a bit dated, but was clean, had a comfortable bed, and was priced well.  You can't beat the location if you want to be in that area of LA. There are many restaurants, stores, and pubs within walking distance.  The staff were all pleasant.  The complimentary breakfast is minimal, but you have other options near by. If you like a bigger breakfast, Foxy's is just down the street.

data.title: Good hotel
data.text: In July 2016, I and my husband we stayed in Vagabond Inn for 5 nights. Nice hotel with elevator, big, pleasant and clean rooms, frendly staff, kean to help if you need something. Vagabong Inn in Glendale is situated close the main boulevard, the malls and the Americana, so you get very easy yours objectivs.

data.title: Two day trip to Glendale for wedding.
data.text: Booked a double queen room for my daughter and I.  Room was clean and very quiet.  Beds were super comfortable.  Excellent location.  Within walking distance of two malls, Brand Blvd. (lots of restaurants) AND the wedding local.  And a great price.
